backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister implementing types, state, and logic for products, carts, orders, coupons, referrals, admin auth, and site settings.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module adding default site settings while preserving existing state during upgrades.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purposes of various frontend files and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template loading the React application root and entry script.
frontend/README.md: Project overview and development instructions for the ShopEase frontend.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application routing setup including shopper routes and the full admin panel with site settings.
frontend/src/components/admin/StripePaym: UI for checking Stripe setup status and submitting secret key and allowed countries.
frontend/src/components/home/BannerCarou: Renders a looping carousel of homepage banner images.
frontend/src/components/home/CategoriesG: Fetches and displays product categories in a grid with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Top-level layout with header, footer, and initialization guard for identity.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Simple footer showing copyright and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Main site header with navigation, search, theme/language toggles, auth handling, and cart count.
frontend/src/components/LoadingSkeletons: Skeleton-loading UI components for product cards, grids, categories, and order rows.
frontend/src/components/product/ProductC: Card UI for a product with image, price, and add‑to‑cart functionality.
frontend/src/components/product/ProductI: Displays a product image with fallback and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/queryClientKe: Defines React Query cache keys for products, cart, orders, and other resources.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAuthz.ts: Provides queries for checking user role, admin status, and verifying admin tokens.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCartWishli: Hooks for fetching cart/wishlist and adding items to the cart.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCatalog.ts: Hooks for fetching products and categories, with sample product migration fallback.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCoupons.ts: Fetches all available coupons via actor.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useOrders.ts: Queries for fetching customer orders and polling a specific order.
Fetches referral user IDs for the authenticated user.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useSiteSettin: Provides React Query hooks to fetch and update site settings via an actor, invalidating the cache on updates.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useStripe.ts: Defines hooks to check Stripe configuration status and set Stripe settings, with cache invalidation on updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor based on user identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminActor.ts: Initializes an anonymous admin actor for privileged operations and exposes loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, and identity persistence using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Wraps next-themes to expose theme value, setter, and dark-mode flag.
frontend/src/i18n/index.tsx: Implements a simple i18n context with English and Hindi translations for UI strings.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme CSS variables and base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCategories: Admin view listing available categories with loading state.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCouponsPag: Admin page displaying total coupons using coupon query with loading state.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard showing static metrics for orders, revenue, and products.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLayoutPage: Admin layout that verifies admin token, redirects unauthorized users, provides sidebar navigation, and renders nested admin pages.
Admin login form that authenticates via backend, stores a session token, and redirects to the admin dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Placeholder page showing a basic layout for future admin order management features.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Product management page that filters, sorts, and lists products using catalog queries.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSiteSettin: Admin page for editing shop name and logo with validation, preview, and save actions.
Placeholder page for upcoming admin user management features.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Renders the cart page, loading user cart data, showing items, summary, and navigating to checkout.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Implements product catalog with filters, sorting, and URL-synced search parameters, fetching products and categories.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles checkout flow with cart summary, payment method selection, and simulated order placement.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays homepage sections including banners, categories, and featured products fetched from the catalog.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Shows order confirmation details using the order ID and navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/orders/MyOrdersPage.t: Displays a logged‑in customer's orders with status, navigation, and loading/empty states.
frontend/src/pages/orders/OrderDetailsPa: Shows details for a specific order including metadata, status, and item list.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Displays payment failure message with actions to retry or return home.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Shows payment success message and links to view orders or continue shopping.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Displays detailed product info with add-to-cart and wishlist actions, handling loading and missing products.
frontend/src/pages/profile/AddressesPage: Displays a card with a translated title and a placeholder message for upcoming address management.
frontend/src/pages/profile/ProfileLayout: Provides the profile layout with tabs, requiring user identity and rendering nested profile pages.
Renders appearance and language settings allowing toggling dark mode and selecting a language.
frontend/src/pages/WishlistPage.tsx: Shows the user's wishlist by matching stored product IDs with fetched products, with login and loading states.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes current project state, goals, architectural notes, existing features, and known issues.
